title: Happy Birthday, Eli-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>....Hm? What’s that noise?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Eliiichikaaaaaaa-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh!? What’s going on!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Elichikaaaa-! Up here! It’s me~! Mari came to celebrate your birthday~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Haaah!? I’m thankful, but what do you mean!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari will lower a rope ladder from the helicopter. Climb on that, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>A rope ladder!? T-, that’s dangerous!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Every birthday needs a little bit of thrill in them♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I don’t think anyone ever says that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s fine, it’s fine! Besides, you climbed on already. Mari knew you could do it, Elichika. Alright, your birthday surprise starts nooooow~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Starts!? This wasn’t it!? Mari, please! Stop with the surprises, just explain it to me already~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
